posts.post_content: Posted By: nbrazil sold Glue on the back is the card's main problem. Otherwise, sharp corners...nice card. Price includes S&H. Does not include insurance. If you want insurance, I will need to factor that into the price. I accept paypal, MO and checks. Emails take higher priority over posts on this thread. Only cards willing to trade for is a T206 magie. thanks! [IMG]http://www.geocities.com/nbbgmad/hofmanback.jpg[/IMG]

Posted By: Jim Manos
